snippet: Aurel Schmidt presents a new show, “Blast Furnace of Civilization,” that deals with subjects of capitalism.
abstract: Exhibit Blast Furnace of Civilization at Half Gallery features drawings and ceramic pieces by artist Aurel Schmidt inspired by symbols drawn from everyday life.
